input: A thin wire will carry _____ current than a large piece of wire.Thicker resistors offer less resistance than thinner resistors.

Robin has an old computer that runs slowly, and Bryan has a powerful new computer. When working on the same task, the computer that will finish the task first isCompared with a less powerful device, a more powerful device can either do more work in the same time or do the same work in less time.
As waves on the ocean grow in size and number they have.With higher frequencies, the microwaves also have more energy.
Will weighs 180 pounds while Nat weights 120 pounds, who would accelerate more after the same force is applied?The smaller its mass is, the greater its acceleration for a given amount of force.

If Mona is performing a science experiment involving chemicals and she decreases the temperature in her lab, what will happen to the amount of chemical weathering she experiences?Chemical weathering increases as: Temperature increases: Chemical reactions proceed more rapidly at higher temperatures.
If Mona lives in a city that begins producing a smaller amount of pollutants, what happens to the air quality in that city?More pollutants mean poorer air quality.

Polly was out in the sun. She has light skin. Her skin likely absorbs _____ vitamin D than a dark-skinned person.Pigments in the skin act like a filter that can prevent the skin from making vitamin D. As a result, people with darker skin need more time in the sun than people with lighter skin to make the same amount of vitamin D.

A membrane with fewer folds will have _____ than one with more folds.The folds present in the membrane increase the surface area allowing more ribosomes to be present on the ER, thereby allowing greater protein production.
